relationships.description: Moody mentioned that Sturgis is unreliable, stating it's the second time he hasn't turned up in a week.
Moody compared Sturgis' unreliability to Mundungus', stating he's getting as unreliable.
Lupin gave Harry advice, telling him to be careful and shaking hands with him.
Moody also shook Harry's hand and advised him to keep his head down and eyes peeled, as well as being careful what he puts in writing.
